Sixth Level Heading 6

In addition to using the HTML tags to format text as an h1 - h6, Recss provides additional classes for styling text. Default styles on the headings works well on content-heavy sites, like blogs and news publications. However, complex web applications may require a designer to use a font out of turn. We have provided a type scale that will allow you to tailor the fonts to your needs.
